meaningMnemonic: If you have nothing to <radical>eat</radical> but your <radical>ego</radical>, you'll <kanji>starve</kanji>. You can't eat it, and your ego is keeping you from accepting actual food or help from other people.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>starve</kanji> (thanks ego) and turn into a <reading>ga</reading>rgoyle (が). As your stomach aches, your skin turns gray and you slowly harden into a crouched position.
